name: Mini Golf but DIE
description:
Go through 3 surreal hellscapes in a fun game of minigolf!

Every time you throw your die, it will roll a different side, all sides have their own effects!

How to play:
Mouse to aim in the opposite way.
LMB push to aim
LMB leave to shoot
For the best experience, play with itch.io's fullscreen on.

Credits:
Ayrond- programming (Twitter)
Garnelle - Music and art (Tumblr, Instagram)
Eighty Ten - SFX

Made in 48 hours for GMTK Game Jam 2022.
